title: [GAMEPLAY] SKT1 Ekko Skin Backing Animation No Sound
body:
[GAMEPLAY]

- Issue: SKT 1 Ekko Skin had a unique backing sound wherein he high fived himself before returning to base, but the backing animation now has no sound at all while recalling.
-How to Reproduce Bug: Select SKT 1 Ekko Skin in any Aram, Rift, or Treeline game ( both match made and custom) and attempt the backing animation.



( Personal note: This was my favourite part about the skin altogether, because it was so unique and fit Ekko's cocky personality. I assume that it was accidentally overwritten when the new sound effects patched out a couple days ago on all the SKT1 skins. Please return this to normal. Thanks.)

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for calling this out! I'll look into this tomorrow; we should be able to get it in for next patch!
Thanks mate! Can't wait to play my new favourite skin again in all his glory.
Fix is in! It'll be on PBE Monday, and in the next patch, so 7.15! :)
I was really excited to log in and play my favourite skin on patch day. Thanks mate.
Same here, not getting the sound either.
